abs: this paper, we use multiple objective genetic local search (MOGLS) algorithm proposed by us in [11]. The algorithm wastested on multiple objective Travelling Salesperson Problem and outperformed MOGLS algorithm of Ishibuchi and Murata [10],3MOGLS based on the idea of MOSA method proposed by Ulungu et al. [19] and Pareto ranking-based evolutionary algorithm[3] proposed by Fonseca and Fleming. Below we describe main ideas of the method.The goal of multiple objective metaheuristics is to...
